data.text: @DanielHewittITV @HRRBFireSafety You joining the @homes4alluk event on Saturday.

@DanielHewittITV also worth investigating service charges & management companies most unregulated profiteering from misery cost living crisis, leaseholders get a bad deal & rarely get media interest other than the cladding. Keep up the great work the fear  of me contacting u has helped huge No

@DanielHewittITV Three years I’ve been fighting my landlord over the damp + mould

Two years it took them to install damp vents but moulds bad as ever

GPS concerned my white blood cell count is elevated & signed off on sick leave

Only have two weeks left on eviction notice & then???? https://t.co/aJwRARd1NZ

@DanielHewittITV @Housing4Women are holding residents back from further bettering their lives. They use tactics to keep residents living in unfit properties for as long as possible and continue renting out properties they shouldn’t. They try and push residents to become intentionally homeless.

@DanielHewittITV This is what some @Housing4Women residents are facing, some have become homeless and lost their homes as a result of HfW’s negligence. Many are still living in homes that are not fit to live in. HfW are quick to send out letters threatening court action but ignore everything else
